select reportNo, reviewNo, userNo, storeName, regDate, reviewContent, status, nickName, reportCount from ( select rr.report_no reportNo, rr.review_no reviewNo, rr.user_no userNo, s.store_name storeName, r.reg_date regDate, r.review_content reviewContent, r.status status, u.nick_name nickName, (select count(*) from tb_report_review rr where rr.review_no = r.review_no) as reportCount from tb_review r join tb_report_review rr on r.review_no = rr.review_no join tb_user u on r.user_no = u.user_no join tb_store s on r.store_no = s.store_no order by reportNo desc) as list

AND storeName like CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') and status = 0
